msbt.message: Thanks for the birthday card, man! I loved it so much that I tasted it! It even came with a present! I sent you a present too, because that card was TASTY!
Thanks for the birthday card! I never knew ya could attach a present to a card! That's wild, man! I'm attaching a thank-you present for you, because now I know how! I hope ya dig it!
I really liked the present you sent me, ! I wanted to say thanks sooner, but I was three bags of chips deep, and watching TV like it's my job! Since I'm late, I got you a present!
I didn't expect a birthday card! From you! For me! On my birthday! In my mailbox! At my house! Neat! Since I am now a year older, I shall endeavor to maintain a level of maturity heretofore unseen.
Thanks for the birthday card! That was a real neat thing you said about how I should have a happy birthday. So I did it! I'm gonna work hard to be happy all year until my next birthday!

I got your birthday card and I wanted to tell you that I liked it.
I liked it!
Thanks, !
